sentences.en: Because of the globalization day by day which the international economy changes.
sentences.cn: 由于世界经济变的日益全球化.

sentences.en: Correctly guiding economic globalization and promoting the joint development of all countries.
sentences.cn: 正确引导经济全球化,促进各国实现共同发展.

sentences.en: Economic globalization and trade liberalization call for an elimination of tariff wall.
sentences.cn: 经济全球化、贸易自由化的发展要求关税壁垒不断被拆除.

sentences.en: Economic globalization brings not only opportunities for development but also challenges.
sentences.cn: 经济全球化所带来的不仅仅有发展机遇,也有严峻的挑战.

sentences.en: Economic globalization is a big trend of our times.
sentences.cn: 经济全球化是我们这个时代的大趋势.

sentences.en: Economy globalization a deep influence on our countrys TCM cause.
sentences.cn: 经济全球化对我国中医药事业的发展影响深远.

sentences.en: Economy globalization of today, packing have already an integral whole with merchandise.
sentences.cn: 经济全球化的今天, 包装与商品已融为一体.

sentences.en: Editor - in - Chief : Let's talk about globalization , one of your big initiatives.
sentences.cn: 总编: 我们来谈谈全球化的问题——你们首先要解决的大问题之一.

sentences.en: Financial convergence is the salient phenomenon under the economic globalization.
sentences.cn: 金融趋同受一定条件的制约,开放经济条件下金融趋同有多种实现路径.

sentences.en: Globalization today and the free movement inevitably makes the dual nationality.
sentences.cn: 在全球化的今天,公民的自由迁徙和流动必然导致双重国籍的产生.

sentences.en: New economy and globalization have become an irreversible trend.
sentences.cn: 新经济和全球化潮流浩浩荡荡.

sentences.en: the increasing globalization of world trade
sentences.cn: 世界贸易的日益全球化

sentences.en: The main character and form of financial globalization is international capital flows.
sentences.cn: 国际资本流动的过程是利益产生和分配的过程.

sentences.en: The needs of the real estate consumption areofof globalization, specialization and individualization.
sentences.cn: 住宅消费全球化 、 专业化、个性化的需求越来越浓.

sentences.en: The world is moving further toward multi - polarization and economic globalization.
sentences.cn: 世界 多极化 和经济全球化趋势进一步发展.

sentences.en: Trends toward the globalization of industry have dramatically affected food production in California.
sentences.cn: 工业全球化的趋势对加利福尼亚的食品生产影响巨大。
